description: Create a new registration attachment to use for uploading a file or a URL to a file. The maximum file size is 500KB and valid file extensions are PDF, JPEG and PNG. For example, many sender ID registrations require a signed 'letter of authorization' (LOA) to be submitted. Use either AttachmentUrl or AttachmentBody to upload your attachment. If both are specified then an exception is returned.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An array of tags (key and value pairs) to associate with the registration attachment. (dict) --- The list of tags to be added to the specified topic. The key identifier, or name, of the tag. The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If you don't specify a client token, a randomly generated token is used for the request to ensure idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: RegistrationAttachmentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the registration attachment.

nested_items.name: RegistrationAttachmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the registration attachment.

nested_items.name: AttachmentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the registration attachment.
UPLOAD_IN_PROGRESS The attachment is being uploaded.
UPLOAD_COMPLETE The attachment has been uploaded.
UPLOAD_FAILED The attachment failed to uploaded.
DELETED The attachment has been deleted..

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: An array of tags (key and value pairs) to associate with the registration attachment.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the registration attachment was created, in UNIX epoch time format.
